channel.title: hard drive on Welcome to My Site!
channel.description: Recent content in hard drive on Welcome to My Site!

item.title: IBM hard drive from 1981
item.description: This picture is of an IBM Model 3380 Hard Drive from 1981. Because it looks like a nuclear device or jet engine, I was able to convince my neighbour that I was generating my own nuclear power from now on, as well as the people at the Chrysler convention that it was an electric engine for a transport truck (I was passing them when going to a high school tech presentation at Bingemans where I used this as a fun prop).
